title: Principles of Web Development
description: In-depth analysis of web development principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.

title: Principles of Algorithms
description: Interdisciplinary approach to algorithms combining theoretical knowledge with practical problem-solving.

title: Applied Computer Graphics
description: Comprehensive study of computer graphics with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.

title: Applied Human-Computer Interaction
description: Rigorous treatment of human-computer interaction theory and applications with emphasis on research methodology.

title: Advanced Cybersecurity
description: Comprehensive study of cybersecurity with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.

title: Advanced Computer Networks
description: Interdisciplinary approach to computer networks combining theoretical knowledge with practical problem-solving.

title: Data Structures
description: Rigorous treatment of data structures theory and applications with emphasis on research methodology.

title: Advanced Artificial Intelligence
description: Comprehensive study of artificial intelligence with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.
prerequisites: COGS 305 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Advanced Programming
description: Comprehensive study of programming with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.
prerequisites: COGS 394 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Special Topics in Software Engineering
description: In-depth analysis of software engineering principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.
prerequisites: COGS 389 and senior standing or graduate status
